page_settings.custom_css: .elementor-element:hover .feature-card { transform: translateY(-8px); box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(124, 58, 237, 0.3) !important; } .elementor-element .feature-card { transition: all 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1); } .gradient-text { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #7c3aed 0%, #ec4899 50%, #fbbf24 100%); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text; animation: gradient-shift 3s ease infinite; background-size: 200% auto; } @keyframes gradient-shift { 0%, 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } } .price-card:hover { transform: translateY(-12px) scale(1.02); box-shadow: 0 25px 50px rgba(124, 58, 237, 0.4) !important; } .price-card { transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.34, 1.56, 0.64, 1); } .testimonial-card:hover { transform: translateY(-6px); box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) !important; } .testimonial-card { transition: all 0.4s ease; } .pulse-icon { animation: pulse 2s ease-in-out infinite; } @keyframes pulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); } 50% { transform: scale(1.1); } } .shimmer { position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .shimmer::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: -50%; left: -50%; width: 200%; height: 200%; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.1), transparent); transform: rotate(45deg); animation: shimmer 3s infinite; } @keyframes shimmer { 0% { transform: translateX(-100%) rotate(45deg); } 100% { transform: translateX(100%) rotate(45deg); } }

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions

settings.editor: No. It's an algorithmic numerology system based on Tarot archetypes. We use mathematical calculations and symbolic interpretations to provide insights, not predictions about the future.

settings.title: Can I use this for business partnerships?

settings.editor: Yes, it works for love, friendships, and collaborations. The compatibility analysis reveals communication styles, shared values, and potential areas of synergy or conflict in any partnership.

settings.title: How fast will I get my result?

settings.editor: Free results are instant. Paid reports arrive within minutes (online + email). Basic and Extended reports are generated immediately after payment and delivered to your email.

Our algorithm is based on traditional numerology principles and Tarot symbolism. While we can't guarantee specific outcomes, thousands of users have found the insights helpful for understanding their relationships better.

settings.title: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?

settings.editor: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with your report, contact our support team for a full refund.
